Bossier_City.Antioch Baptist Church (Shreveport, Loui:
Antioch Baptist Church is a historic church located in Shreveport, Louisiana.
On April 23, 1866 two leaders of the First Baptist Church honorably dismissed 73 black members of its church so they could begin construction of a new black, Baptist church. This church came to be known as the First Colored Baptist Church of Shreveport.
